title: London/Holborn-Clerkenwell
name: Fluid
price: Bottled beers £2.90+, cocktails £6+. Free entry, except F Sa 21:00-22:00 £3, after £5
content: A stylish loosely Japanese themed bar upstairs (they serve sushi), with a more spread out dance floor down a spiral metal staircase. Plenty of sofas everywhere, although on the weekends you will have to get down early to slump in a chair.
